diagnosis.final_diagnosis: cholecystitis s/p lap->open cholecystectomy, metastatic neuroendocrine tumor with obstructive cholangitis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The final diagnosis was based on imaging findings that showed a distended gallbladder with sludge and thickened walls indicative of cholecystitis, alongside the presence of metastatic lesions and obstructive cholangitis as evidenced by the patient's symptoms and imaging studies.
